website_summaries.verdict: With 3 different pots, this candy melter is a good choice when you need to use several colors at the same time.
pros: Ideal for candy pops and cookies
Multiple bowls make it easy to use different colors at the same time
Easy to add more candy as you go
cons: Pots aren't very big, so it's best for when you need small amounts of several colors

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I opted for this candy melter vs the Wilton on that was almost $40. You get a better value for your money with this one, since it comes with 3 pots vs the 1 with the Wilton warmer. It doesn’t take long to heat up and melt your chocolates. Granted, the pots are a little small but honesty, not a big deal at all if you’re just dipping strawberries or cake pops or anything like that.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great For All Your Melting Needs!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It will be your go-to for melting. So easy to use and clean up is fast and simple - soap and water!! Use it to make wax samples for my business. Great way to switch from one scent to another, quickly and without a mess! No matter what you are melting, heating, etc. - this is perfect for those smaller amounts of different flavors, scents, colors, and anything else you can think of. Pull out one pot and put in another. It really is that simple and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Its kinda small but its nothing to heat up extra candy melts I Love it! And it make my cake balls so much easier to make when I'm doing multiple colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny!
customer_reviews.text: This is much smaller than I expected. It looks more like a child's play thing. Too small for me to dip anything other than a small cake pop.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie F.

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice way to heat up chocolate for cake pops. It's my go to for my pops. I am very glad I found it. Just wish it was bigger and held more chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: RE

customer_reviews.title: So Easy and Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This melting pot makes dipping strawberries, cake pops, or any kind treat so much easier than just using a bowl. The machine comes with three pots which is soo convenient for decorating with different candies or colors. This melts the candy fast and keeps it warm without burning it. I just wish it was a bit bigger and could hold more, but it's easy to add more as you go since it melts so quickly. Great great product!
customer_reviews.author: Heather9535

customer_reviews.title: Worst Purchase I've Ever Made from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This melter takes an eternity. At least 30 minutes to melt the tiny pot and the flimsy metal basically cools instantly if you're not juggling the 3 pots constantly on the burner. Easily the most frustrating and worse product I've ever purchased from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!!
customer_reviews.text: Garbage, I buy several brands of chocolate and never worked as it should be. The chocolate never melted completely.
customer_reviews.author: Delia Campos

customer_reviews.title: WorksWell For Small Batches
customer_reviews.text: This works well when a small amount is needed quickly. It has three very small pans holding two-three portions of chocolate bark. It's not useful if you need to dip 10 or more pieces at one time. The pan isn't big enough to hold chocolate for 10 marshmallows or cookies or truffles.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Melts your chocolate slow and nice and keeps it warm just right
customer_reviews.text: I'm only sorry I found out about this product this late. Melts your chocolate slow and nice and keeps it warm just right. Comes in handy when you have 100+ cake pops to dip. Buy it! What are you waiting for? Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Pope

customer_reviews.title: Great for Melting Crayons for Batik Art
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to melt crayons, rather than chocolate. It is wonderful for my purposes (batik work and crayon paintings on t-shirts). My only reservations have to do with the pots. The handles are very flimsy, and it's not unimaginable that they might break off. Even that I wouldn't mind so much, if I knew where I could get replacement pots. So far, none of that has happened, but I would like to know if there are options to purchase more pots, just in case. It has been worth every penny I spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Brownfield

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the money if you want to keep your chocolate melted while you make cake pops
customer_reviews.author: Ben F

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful melting pots!
